data.name: LearnSliderSuggestionAcceptDescription
data.value: With the suggestion engine set up and trained, Scripture Forge may offer {0}Translators{1} suggestions as they type.

data.name: LearnSliderSuggestionAcceptEnter
data.value: Simply hit {0}ENTER{1} or click on the suggestion to accept it, or hit {0}ESC{1} or continue typing to ignore it.

data.name: LearnSliderSuggestionAcceptHeader
data.value: Accepting a Translation Suggestion

data.name: LearnSliderSuggestionAcceptLearn
data.value: The {0}suggestion engine learns{1} and provides better suggestions as each verse is translated.

data.name: LearnSliderSuggestionAcceptReceive
data.value: {0}Translators{1} can {2}receive suggestions{3} about how to translate the next word or phrase, as they type.

data.name: LearnSliderSuggestionSetupBased
data.value: Select a project the translation is {0}Based on{1} and the intelligent suggestion engine can be trained to {2}provide helpful translation suggestions{3}.

data.name: LearnSliderSuggestionSetupBest
data.value: Most effective on {0}closely related projects{1} with similar grammar and style of translation, such as adaptation projects.

data.name: LearnSliderSuggestionSetupDescription
data.value: {0}Administrators{1} can enable {2}Translation Suggestions{3} to assist {0}Translators{1}.

data.name: LearnSliderSuggestionSetupHeader
data.value: Setting Up Translation Suggestions

data.name: LearnSliderTranslateEditDescription
data.value: {0}Administrators{1} can connect a {4}Paratext{5} project to Scripture Forge to edit Scripture as they would in Paratext, while {2}benefiting from increased collaboration{3} options.

data.name: LearnSliderTranslateEditHeader
data.value: Editing Scripture

data.name: LearnSliderTranslateEditScripture
data.value: {0}Edit Scripture{1} in Scripture Forge as you would in Paratext’s {2}Basic{3} view.

data.name: LearnSliderTranslateEditSync
data.value: {0}Synchronize{1} your Scripture Forge project with Paratext to keep your work up to date.

data.name: LearnSliderTranslateCollaborateDescription
data.value: {0}Translators{1} can work on projects collaboratively, {2}editing Scripture at the same time{3}.

data.name: LearnSliderTranslateCollaborateHeader
data.value: Collaborating on Scripture

data.name: LearnSliderTranslateCollaborateLocation
data.value: Work with {0}Translators{1} in {2}multiple locations{3} on the same project.

data.name: LearnSliderTranslateCollaborateRealtime
data.value: See other {0}Translators'{1} {2}edits in real time{3}, as they type.

data.name: LearnSliderTranslateCollaborateVerse
data.value: Collaborate on the same book, same chapter, or {0}even the same verse{1}.
